ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Horizons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Alright - it s Offtopic, but I ll respond.  According to this month s PC Gamer, they now have several companies looking at publishing them.  Things are
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:59 PM 9/8/00 +0000, you wrote:
>Assuming they get future additional funding, when is Horizons scheduled for
>release? Based on what I read, if they don't get the funding the project
>will fall through, which will be a shame based on the promise of this game.

Alright - it's Offtopic, but I'll respond. According to this month's PC
Gamer, they now have several companies looking at publishing them. Things
are looking up for David. I must admit, I owe him an apology - I never
really thought he'd get this far, based on the performance of his
less-than-stellar game "Demise".

Talies the Wanderer
